title: Block-based Programming Demos
description: This series of videos demonstrates various programming concepts such as loops and conditional statements in block-based languages such as Snap, geared for K-12 students.

title: Macronutrient Data Scrollytelling
description: I helped create a scrollytelling article that provides information on macronutrient and metabolic data using Javascript/CSS/HTML.

title: Visualizing Bike Traffic in Boston
description: Using d3.js, I implemented an interactive map visualization of bike traffic in the Boston, MA area during different times of the day.

title: Visualizing Mice Activity
description: This visualization displays temperature and activity data from a 14-day study on mice using d3.js. Users can use a dropdown menu and buttons to customize and filter based on measure, gender, and time of day.

title: Power Outage Data Analysis
description: This data analysis investigates what influences the cause and duration of major U.S. power outages. We used historical data from January 2000 to July 2016 to uncover trends and understand how we can inform more resilient infrastructure planning.

title: Online Shopping Consumer Behavior Data Analysis
description: The goal of the analysis was to explore how the time of a consumer's visit to an e-commerce website could be associated with the number of marketing tactics used on a product page.

title: Spotify Charts Data Analysis
description: This project analyzes trends in the top 200 weekly songs on Spotify for a year. Using pandas and the Spotify Web API, I explore song attributes such as explicitness and genre to see if they are associated with their chart rank.

title: Software Tool Tutorials
description: This website contains tutorials on various software tools used in CSE 15L at UC San Diego, such as directory commands and the markdown language.
